content:
Hey @Esteban Küber do you remember the idea I proposd at some point, to modify the model of errors so that we could add a "sequence" of steps that were meant to be read in order, where it would render either as

let x = foo();
        --- (1) blah blah...
let y = bar();
     - (2) ..so blah blah.

or as

note: blah blah
> let x = foo();
          ---
note: ...so blah blah
> let y = bar();
    -

depending on whether the ordering of the source matched or not?
these questions on #72543 reminded me of it
@nikomatsakis I think you made a gist about it. I think I starred it, but I can't seem to find the list of all gists I starred.
I remember. one of the things that is unresolved with that is how vscode (for example) should behave with them
